hero.title: Your Trusted Wholesale Partner
hero.subtitle: Premium products at competitive prices for your business needs. Streamlined ordering, reliable shipping, and exceptional service.

benefits.pricing_text: Get the best wholesale prices with volume discounts and special deals for regular customers.
benefits.quality_text: All products are sourced from trusted suppliers and undergo rigorous quality checks.
benefits.shipping_text: Efficient order processing and reliable shipping partners ensure timely delivery of your orders.

footer.company_description: Your trusted partner for wholesale products. We offer competitive prices and quality products for businesses of all sizes.
